description:
Functional and colorful through the winter with 100% fine Merino Wool: These are ideal base layers thanks to their medium fabric weight of 185g/m³, but they also cut a fine figure when worn on their own on warmer days. Their natural Functionality and soft feel are an unbeatable duo: Itch-free comfort is guaranteed thanks to fine wool fibers with a soft 19-micron diameter and optimum mositiure and temperature regulation. The natural raw material also stays odor-free for several days, even if you’ve worked up a good sweat freeriding.

The 185 Merino Print line also scores points with new colors and casual designs. An absolute must-have top for winter in the mountains!
name: Ortovox 185 Merino Brand Outline LS - Mens
